casebody.data:
Russell E. LAVIGNE II
v.
John G. SARANTOPOULOS Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 21, 2017

R. Francis DiPrete, in support of the petition.

Ariel R. MacPherson and Thomas R. Gerarde, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 40500) is denied.

KAHN, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
